blogPost.excerpt: Are you lazy? Don’t have time for Linkedin? Meet Linvo. Linvo allows you to grow your network faster to achieve your goals more quickly. Instead of getting five connections every day and five messages. You get 80 connections every day and 80 messages.
blogPost.body: Are you lazy? Don’t have time for Linkedin? Meet Linvo. Linvo allows you to grow your network faster to achieve your goals more quickly. Instead of getting five connections every day and five messages. You get 80 connections every day and 80 messages.
blogPost.title: Linvo - Get more leads and sales on Linkedin
blogPost.author: Nevo David

localize.description: 你懒惰吗？没有时间玩LinkedIn吗？见见林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地扩展网络，从而更快地实现目标。而不是每天收到五个连接和五条消息。你每天都会收到80个连接和80条消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上获取更多线索和销售

localize.description: 你懶惰嗎？沒有時間玩LinkedIn嗎？見見林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地擴展網絡，從而更快地實現目標。而不是每天收到五個連接和五條消息。你每天都會收到80個連接和80條消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上獲取更多線索和銷售
